title: Samsung's massive 18-inch tablet has one weird stand and handle
text:
Samsung's massive 18-inch tablet has one weird stand and handle 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
Samsung's rumored gargantuan 18.4-inch tablet looks like it will have a strange stand for propping it up at various angles and a handle for ...
